name: Garden of Seif: Chronicles of an Assassin
storyline: An undercover assassin is on a mission to knock out her marks, but things turn upside down when a guild of enemy assassins is after her bounty. She runs into two mysterious men along her journey, both claiming to be trustworthy, but their secrets could lead her deeper into trouble.
summary: Garden of Seif is a narrative-driven game where choices matter. Play as Iris Lapis, an assassin navigating a world of danger, adventure, and romance. Two enemy love interests arrive and claim to be trustworthy, but can they win her heart?
